documents.document: Looking forward to more of @JohnMoynes poetry in the not-so-distant future. I believe they will be emerging in book form.

@thebrandgeeks What is the tally so far? #irishbizparty
@jmcnamaracoach I have an issue that I can get to capacity for a while and then a number of clients can leave concurrently. #irishbizparty
@jmcnamaracoach The beginning was a little fragile clientwise but things have strengthened up since then. #IrishBizParty
